about_the_game:
--- DEMO VERSION ---

Get ready to experience a taste of the mind-bending and innovative gameplay of LAPSUS with the demo version. This 2D puzzle-platformer will challenge you to think in multiple timelines simultaneously as you navigate through a few carefully selected levels.

In this demo, you will get a glimpse of the unique time-travel mechanic that allows you to manipulate time and space to solve puzzles and progress through a wide variety of levels.

While the full version of the game boasts over 80 levels spread across four distinct zones, the demo version will give you a taste of the challenging gameplay and never-before-seen mechanics that await you. With just a few levels to conquer, you'll still need to be mentally stretched and squeezed to overcome the obstacles ahead.

Embark on a thrilling and exhilarating journey as you test your skills and push your cognitive abilities to the limit. Can you crack the puzzles and reach the end of the demo, or will you be left wanting more? Try the LAPSUS demo and find out!

While the full version of the game boasts over 80 levels spread across four distinct zones, the demo version will give you a taste of the challenging gameplay and never-before-seen mechanics that await you. With just a few levels to conquer, you'll still need to be mentally stretched and squeezed to overcome the obstacles ahead.

name: LAPSUS Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 /8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Graphics: Compatible con Pixel Shader 2.0 y Vertex Shader 2.0 (la compatibilidad con Vertex Shader puede ser emulada por software)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: In this DEMO version, you'll get a taste of the mind-bending puzzles and physics-based challenges that await you in the full game. With a wide variety of levels, this demo version is perfect for players who want to experience the core gameplay mechanics of LAPSUS.
